visualization

Class ViperChartAPICall

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualization.ViperChartAPICall

  • public class ViperChartAPICall
extends java.lang.Object
    This class does the API calls to ViperCharts that generate useful visualization charts of classifier performance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Initialization.

      • ViperChartAPICall

        public ViperChartAPICall(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> algorithmNames,

                 float[] fprValues,
                 float[] tprValues)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        algorithmNames - ArrayList representing the algorithm names.
        predictedDataLabels - ArrayList representing the predicted class labels for each algorithm on the data.
        binaryDataLabels - int[] representing the ground truth labels.

    • Method Detail

      • openInBrowser

        public void openInBrowser(boolean openInBrowser)

      • generateChartForType

        public java.lang.String generateChartForType(ChartType cType)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This method makes the API call for the specified chart type.
        Parameters:
        cType - ChartType to be calculated by ViperCharts.
        Returns:
        String that is the URI of the generated chart, or an error message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        A script that generates a chart from the classification results.
        Parameters:
        args - String[] that are the command line parameters, as specified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
